channel.title: Adding bank tabs
channel.description:
I'm trying to add bank tabs of course and the tutorial im following for my 508 loading 525 cache & Roflpvp base is http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/141497-508-99-banking.html However the problem is, is when i compile i get these errors [code] Compiling net/com/Roflpvp/*.java .\net\com\RoflPvp\model\Player.java:1903: cannot find symbol symbol : variable size location: class net.com.RoflPvp.model.items.PlayerBank public int[] bankItems = new int[Engine.playerBank.size]; ^ .\net\com\RoflPvp\model\Player.java:1904: cannot find symbol symbol : variable size location: class net.com.RoflPvp.model.items.PlayerBank public int[] bankItemsN = new int[Engine.playerBank.size]; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If someone could help me find out whats wrong that would be great. Thanks
